answers.a: Commonly used in chocolate and compound chocolate to improve flow and processing; also found in confectionery, cocoa-based spreads/coatings, margarines and low‑fat spreads, some bakery products/fillings, and coffee creamers as an emulsifier.

answers.q: emachine e442-v133 how to adjust the display
answers.a: That appears to be a laptop question; regarding E442 ammonium phosphatides, it’s an emulsifier mainly used in chocolate and confectionery to aid mixing and flow.

answers.q: emachine e442-v133 how to adjust the display stretched
answers.a: This looks like a computer-display query; for the food additive E442, it’s used in chocolate/compound chocolate to manage viscosity and help disperse fats uniformly.
That seems to refer to a computer model; the food additive E442 has been in commercial food use for decades and is authorized in the EU and other countries.

answers.q: how to bring up bios e442-v133
answers.a: That’s a BIOS question for a PC; about E442, it’s a permitted emulsifier used at low levels in chocolate and related confectionery products to improve processing.
